data.title: Best of the Northwest 2015
data.meta_description: An investor's guide to publicly traded companies based in Washington, Idaho and Oregon.
data.text:
No single yardstick would be a fair gauge to rank the Northwest's publicly traded companies. We picked five measures of corporate performance â return on invested capital, free cash-flow yield, stock-price appreciation, revenue growth and dividend yield â then combined them into a single ranking using our proprietary formula. Read more about our methodology.

To use the chart: Click on a column to sort the chart, or filter by industry. All columns are for fiscal year 2014, except where otherwise noted. Stock prices are year-end (Dec. 31). Cells marked "NM" are "not meaningful."
